```{r}
#| label: set-up
library(tidyverse)
library(NHSRdatasets)

local_covid <- NHSRdatasets::covid19 |>
  filter(countries_and_territories == params$country)
```

# Overview

`r params$country` has `r local_covid |> summarise(total = n())` records.

# Over time

```{r}
#| label: covid-chart

ggplot(data = local_covid, aes(
  date_reported,
  cases
)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    x = "Date Reported",
    y = "Cases"
  ) +
  expand_limits(y = 0)
```
